title: Barcelona Typeface
content:
Wondering if anyone can identify this typeface from a video.

Has hints of Basque lettering, but I can't place it.

Any information is greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747im_/http:/typophile.com/files/barcelona_6296.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [barcelona.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/typophile.com/files/barcelona.png) | 151.2 KB |
author: dicharry

comments.content:
Sorry, don't know this one. Most probably a custom job for the occasion. You best chance is probably to directly contact the designer(s) behind this video and ask them.  
If you need alternatives, some previous related discussions: [http://typophile.com/node/100787](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/typophile.com/node/100787 "http://typophile.com/node/100787"), [http://typophile.com/node/100237](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/typophile.com/node/100237 "http://typophile.com/node/100237"), [http://typophile.com/node/98172](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/typophile.com/node/98172 "http://typophile.com/node/98172"), [http://typophile.com/node/94940](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/typophile.com/node/94940 "http://typophile.com/node/94940")  
Unfortunately, don't know this one. As usual, looks like it has been started from [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura). Some suggestions: [Diamonds](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/diamonds/), [Evolette A](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/26plus-zeichen.de/en/fonts/tj-evolette-a/), [Lightyears](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/lightyears), many ones at [TenDollarFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/www.tendollarfonts.com/) (TWOFACED, Echelon, Rathe, Parqa, Fonecian, Finding 57, Harf 77, Labieno, Positano, Marina, Alumia...)  
More inspiration: [I Am So Tired With Your Experimental Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/experimentalsans.tumblr.com/)

Thanks for the suggestions. I managed to track it down here:

[http://www.ultratypes.com/product/nina](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022054747/http:/www.ultratypes.com/product/nina "http://www.ultratypes.com/product/nina")

Has some interesting elements.
